title: Network Services Gateway
description: Specify configuration for Nuage MetroAE NSGvs.

vmname.title: VM name
vmname.description: Name of the NSGv VM on the hypervisor/vcenter

target_server_type.title: Target Server type
target_server_type.description: Type of environment into which the NSGv will be instantiated, supported values are 'kvm', 'vcenter' and 'aws'

target_server.title: Target Server hostname
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor or vCenter server where the NSGv will be instantiated

bootstrap_method.title: Bootstrap Method
bootstrap_method.description: Bootstrap method for the NSGv. The default is 'none' which means no bootstrap will be performed. 'zfb_metro' creates a boostrap ISO file based on the contents of the file zfb_vars.yml. 'zfb_external' is used when a 3rd-party ISO file is to be used.

iso_path.title: External Bootstrap ISO File Directory
iso_path.description: Local path to the 3rd-party ISO file to use for bootstrap. Only required when bootstrap_method id set to 'zfb_external'

iso_file.title: External Bootstrap ISO File Name
iso_file.description: Name of the 3rd-party ISO file to use for bootstrap. Only required when bootstrap_method id set to 'zfb_external'

nsgv_mac.title: NSGV MAC Address
nsgv_mac.description: MAC address the proxy will use to recognize the NSGV at boot/DHCP time. Only required when bootstrap_method is set to 'zfb_metro'

vcenter_datacenter.title: VCenter Datacenter
vcenter_datacenter.description: vCenter datacenter, only applicable for vcenter server type and defaults to global settings

vcenter_cluster.title: VCenter Cluster
vcenter_cluster.description: vCenter cluster, only applicable for vcenter server type and defaults to global settings

vcenter_datastore.title: VCenter Datastore
vcenter_datastore.description: vCenter datastore, only applicable for vcenter server type and defaults to global settings
